/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the soft glow of daylight. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the rhythm of daily life in this city. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the bustling activity below.
